items.title: Crypto Arbitrage Bot
items.summary: Automated crypto trading bot exploiting price spreads between Binance and Buda exchanges using Golang for microsecond-level performance.
items.problem: Crypto exchanges often have small but exploitable price differences (spreads) across markets. Manually tracking and executing trades fast enough to profit from these inefficiencies is impossible for humans.
items.solution: Built a fully automated arbitrage bot using Golang for low-latency performance. A lightweight Node.js + React.js backoffice allowed users to set parameters. The bot continuously polled Binance and Buda spot prices in microseconds, instantly executing buy/sell pairs when spreads exceeded thresholds.
impact: Consistently detected profitable spreads in volatile markets
Demonstrated high-performance concurrency handling in Go

items.title: Ztudia
items.summary: AI-powered adaptive learning platform generating personalized exercises using GPT models with validation pipelines.
items.problem: Students lack adaptive learning tools that focus on what they personally need to master for their exams. Existing systems don't generate personalized exercises tied to conceptual understanding.
items.solution: Created an experimental AI-powered learning platform that generates personalized exercises per topic/subtopic. Built with Wasp (React + Node + Prisma) featuring atomic topics, detailed descriptions, and custom exercises generated dynamically. Used GPT-3.5/4o with 2-3 post-generation validation checks.
impact: Enabled adaptive question generation with real-time feedback
Served as early prototype for mastery-based AI tutoring
Provided technical foundation for Arbor School (preu.arbor.school)

items.title: TradesILike (TIL)
items.summary: Real-time financial simulation platform with live data for 2000+ assets, featuring portfolio tracking and competitive leaderboards.
items.problem: Investing education is often theoretical and risk-free paper trading lacks realism. Learners needed a way to simulate real portfolios against live data and compare their decisions to others without financial risk.
items.solution: Built TradesILike.com — a financial simulation platform where users create portfolios and compete in real-time. Fetched data for 2000+ assets every 5 seconds via GCP Cloud Functions, storing prices and portfolio states in MongoDB TimeSeries collections. React.js frontend visualized portfolio performance, per-stock returns, and leaderboards.
impact: Helped users learn portfolio management by doing
Handled real-time data ingestion at scale efficiently

posts.title: Ship Faster by Knowing When NOT to Use AI
posts.excerpt: The fastest way to real impact with AI isn't a clever prompt — it's knowing where AI excels, where it fails, and where to go deterministic. Use strong exemplars, a stable spec, and ruthless validation.

posts.title: The Truth About AI Engineers (From an ex-CTO)
posts.excerpt: AI hasn't made learning easier for engineers—they just face different lessons now. The best engineers today use AI as a force multiplier, not a crutch.
